body:
We highly encourage advertising the server on youtube, mostly for fun though. Many people have been asking what are the requisites for such ranks.
VIP: Around 5,000 subscribers- this is the one that people should aim for. VIPs receive emerald donor rank things- 2.0 xp multiplier. An example is Peckett- he will be making videos soon. 
Youtubers: Around 50,000 subscribers. This is for major youtubers that join the server and make videos for us. These people receive all of the kits possible. An example is Woofless.

The reasons that we have such high numbers are lengthy. The main reason is that we dont want 1,000 VIPs running around, we want to make it special, yet attainable. Trust me, if you put a solid year and a half into youtube, you can achieve the VIP rank sooner than you think. 

These numbers are subject to change in the future. Also, they are rough estimates. Certain exceptions do exist.  

To apply, please Skype me at gilletteracer
body_tagged:
We highly encourage advertising the server on youtube, mostly for fun though. Many people have been asking what are the requisites for such ranks.
VIP: Around 5,000 subscribers- this is the one that people should aim for. VIPs receive emerald donor rank things- 2.0 xp multiplier. An example is Peckett- he will be making videos soon. 
Youtubers: Around 50,000 subscribers. This is for major youtubers that join the server and make videos for us. These people receive all of the kits possible. An example is Woofless.

The reasons that we have such high numbers are lengthy. The main reason is that we dont want 1,000 VIPs running around, we want to make it special, yet attainable. Trust me, if you put a solid year and a half into youtube, you can achieve the VIP rank sooner than you think. 

These numbers are subject to change in the future. Also, they are rough estimates. Certain exceptions do exist.  

To apply, please Skype me at gilletteracer

replies.body:
Since this thread is revived, I'll make a suggestion:

Why not lower the requirements for VIP and YouTuber ranks? At the moment they seem extremely high. Why not lower them to encourage more players to help promote the server? With the small player base we now have, it makes sense to do whatever we can to publicize the server.

replies.body: I put a lot of effort into my YT channel, and I still only have 14 subs. It's really hard to get anywhere tbh, but once you're past 100 I hear you gain subs fast, but it seems like I just cant get off the 14 sub mark. I upload decently consistently as well. I don't think anyone who was an Avicus YTer has ever got 5000 subs either. I think the goals should be lowered, as no one has the rank. And as Tynvale said, give it to the people who you feel are a real part of the community.

I don't think anyone who was an Avicus YTer has ever got 5000 subs either. I think the goals should be lowered, as no one has the rank. And as Tynvale said, give it to the people who you feel are a real part of the community.

replies.body:
Well, let's say someone with 200 subscribers actively uploads Avicus YouTuve videos. They still wouldn't get the rank, despite the fact that they are putting as much dedication and effort as they can towards the server. 200 subscribers isn't really a large amount, and I highly doubt that the advertising they do would have an impact on such a low amount of people. 

Ideally, VIP people should have both a good subscriber count and dedication to the server, because in this way they can impact the server more.

replies.body: I would say that if we bring it down to 2000 subs for VIP and 10 000 for youtuber. 500 is plainly too easy to get, much easier as 200. VIP = very important person. You aren't that important with 200 or 500 subs. Maybe on the server you are but in the world it isn't... it isn't close to the size of most highschools usually (1.2K). 2000 IMO should be max to bring down. For youtuber giving 10 000 would be fine to bring as minimum subs, that is when youtube actually aknowledges you and will start giving your royalties without having to partner your channel with machinima, freedom, e.t.c. But I personally like how we have it now, don't think we should change it :)
replies.body_tagged: I would say that if we bring it down to 2000 subs for VIP and 10 000 for youtuber. 500 is plainly too easy to get, much easier as 200. VIP = very important person. You aren't that important with 200 or 500 subs. Maybe on the server you are but in the world it isn't... it isn't close to the size of most highschools usually (1.2K). 2000 IMO should be max to bring down. For youtuber giving 10 000 would be fine to bring as minimum subs, that is when youtube actually aknowledges you and will start giving your royalties without having to partner your channel with machinima, freedom, e.t.c. But I personally like how we have it now, don't think we should change it :)

replies.body: Every player is the same amount of important. :)
replies.body_tagged: Every player is the same amount of important. :)

replies.body: It probably is recent, but the rank "famous" has probably replaced the rank "VIP" but has all the same benefits, but instead of VIP (Very Important Peron) which can cause a few questions as of why he is very important but "famous" gives out that he is famous, it does bring the question why he is famous or how, but it's not as confusing as "Why is he Important?"
